column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Mako says : " Good afternoon .
#Text=Last time a bunch of teenagers came in here , they trashed the whole room .
#Text=" Macao says : " We found you !
#Text=" Innkeeper says : " Hey , no bending in here !
#Text=Take it outside !
#Text=" Macao says : " Whoa , whoa , whoa , whoa , whoa .
#Text=We 're not here to fight you .
#Text=We 're here to meet Nuktuk !
#Text=" Lily says : " We 're your biggest fans .
#Text=Can you make it out to Lily and Macao ?
#Text=" Bolin says : " Uh , I 'd be happy to .
#Text=Always love meeting my fans .
#Text=" Lily says : " I made this Nuktuk doll for you .
#Text=" Bolin says : " Uh , it 's ... cute .
#Text=" Innkeeper says : " Why did n't you tell me your friend was a mover star ?
#Text=I 'd be happy to rent you any room in the inn .
#Text=" Mako says : " We 'll just take the one across from 102 .
#Text=" Innkeeper says : " But that room is too small for the four of you !
#Text=" Mako says : " Trust me , it 'll be perfect .
#Text="
